full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA RGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA PA DE NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI BA ZHES, ,AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN @016A *, ,PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA'I NAN TAN GYIS, YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO CHOG PAR SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS THAL SHAL BA BYUNG RGYAL TU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, BRIS LA LHAG CHAD LA SOGS PA'I NYIS SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS RTZIS BAS ZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, GAL TE LEGS CHA CHUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU LAM BZANG GI RKYEN NGAN BAR CHOD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
